Documentation.long_help: Applies an ARAP UV Parametrization on a polygonal mesh.
Documentation.short_help: Applies an ARAP UV Parametrization on a polygonal mesh.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Lambda
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Parameter to give importance to shape or angle preservation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimal energy difference between two iterations for the minimization process to continue.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfIterations
IntVectorProperty.label: Maximum Number Of Iterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximal number of iterations in the energy minimization process.

IntVectorProperty.name: SkipPostprocess
IntVectorProperty.label: Skip Postprocess
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Removes postprocess of ARAP parametrization. Helpful when unwrap result has overlaps.
